2.name: Kill
2.description: Kill target (in most cases need XP/Honor reward)

16.name: Deal melee ability
16.description: Done attack by Spell that has dmg class melee

32.name: Take melee ability
32.description: Taken attack by Spell that has dmg class melee

256.name: Deal ranged ability
256.description: Done attack by Spell that has dmg class ranged

512.name: Take ranged ability
512.description: Taken attack by Spell that has dmg class ranged

1024.name: Deal helpful ability
1024.description: Done positive spell that has dmg class none

2048.name: Take helpful ability
2048.description: Taken positive spell that has dmg class none

4096.name: Deal harmful ability
4096.description: Done negative spell that has dmg class none

8192.name: Take harmful ability
8192.description: Taken negative spell that has dmg class none

16384.name: Deal helpful spell
16384.description: Done positive spell that has dmg class magic

32768.name: Take helpful spell
32768.description: Taken positive spell that has dmg class magic

65536.name: Deal harmful spell
65536.description: Done negative spell that has dmg class magic

131072.name: Take harmful spell
131072.description: Taken negative spell that has dmg class magic

2097152.name: Deal helpful periodic
2097152.description: On trap activation (possibly needs name change to ON_GAMEOBJECT_CAST or USE)

4194304.name: Main hand weapon swing
4194304.description: Done main-hand melee attacks (spell and autoattack)

8388608.name: Off hand weapon swing
8388608.description: Done off-hand melee attacks (spell and autoattack)

1.name: cast
1.description: trigger when spell has just finished casting

2.name: hit
2.description: trigger when the spell hits its target

4.name: finish
4.description: trigger after spell has done all its effects on all targets

1.name: while hit
1.description: enchant shall only proc off white hits (not abilities)

2.name: limit 60
2.description: enchant effects shall be reduced past lvl 60

1.name: req exp or honor
1.description: requires proc target to give exp or honor for aura proc

2.name: triggered can proc
2.description: aura can proc even with triggered spells

4.name: req mana cost
4.description: requires triggering spell to have a mana cost for aura proc

8.name: req spellmod
8.description: requires triggering spell to be affected by proccing aura to drop charges

128.name: reduce proc 60
128.description: aura should have a reduced chance to proc if level of proc Actor > 60

256.name: can't proc from item cast
256.description: do not allow aura proc if proc is caused by a spell casted by item

1.name: exclusive
1.description: auras from group can't stack with each other

2.name: exclusive from same caster
2.description: auras from group can't stack with each other when cast by same caster

3.name: exclusive same effect
3.description: same effects of spells will not stack, yet auras will remain on a target

4.name: highest
4.description: only highest effect will remain on target
